name: TH Strikes Back
overview:
TH Strikes Back is the sequel to Thunder Hoop. Like its predecessor it is a 2D side-scrolling platform game. Set ten years after the events of the first game. The game starts with Genbreaks forces attacking the TH project facility aiming to steel the Thunder Hoop DNA. You once again assume the role of a now adult Thunder Hoop.

As you traverse the stages, you have jump on platforms and defend yourself from Genbreaks creatures and human forces. You can use your fists to shoot at the enemies and kill them, jumping enemies on the head will also kill them. The game has two shoot buttons (normal and super shot) and various items can be collected while fighting of the enemies and bosses. You can play solo or with a friend simultaneously.
